channel.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/biTKc.png[/img][/center] [hr][hr] [b][size=18pt]Keys[/size][/b] This feature has been already started: [/] This feature has been finished: [!] This features has not been started yet: [] [hr][hr]
[ul][li][size=18pt][b]Teleports & Contents:[/b][/size] [b]Training Areas [CARPET] :[/b] [list] [li]Custom Training Area [][/li] [li]Tzhaar Training Cave [][/li] [li]Rock Crab Training Area [][/li] [li]Slayer Tower Training Castle [][/li] [/list]
[b]Bosses [NPC] :[/b] [list] [li]GodWars Bosses [][/li] [li]King Black Dragon [][/li] [li]Dragannoth Lair [][/li] [li]Elemental Choas [][/li] [/list]
[b]Minigames [PORTAL] :[/b][list] [li]Barrows [][/li] [li]Pest Control [][/li] [li]Tzhaar Pits [][/li] [li]Duel Arena [][/li] [/list]
[b]PVP / Pking Teleports [PORTAL] :[/b][list] [li]Mage Bank [][/li] [li]Wilderness [][/li] [/list]
[b]Skilling [ AMULET ] :[/b][list] [li]Mining [][/li] [li]Smithing [][/li] [li]Fishing [][/li] [li]Cooking [][/li] [li]WoodCutting [][/li] [li]Farming [][/li] [/list][/li][/ul]
[hr]
[ul][li][size=18pt][b]Known Bugs:[/b][/size][/li] [list] [li]Magic Store: When you click the magic store seller, The client crashes [][/li] [li]Pest Control: When you get into the boat, The client crashes [][/li] [li]Tzhaar Cave: Must be fixed, Many random bugs [][/li] [li]Player Saving: Player saving must be fixed. Timer and everything [][/li] [li]Home Map: Few recoloring must be done [][/li] [li]Multi Attack Icon: It displays the Arrow Head Icon [][/li] [/list]
[hr] [list][li][size=18pt][b]Home Area:[/b][/size] [b]Shops[/b] [list] [li]Magic Store [][/li] [li]Weaponry [][/li] [li]Archery [][/li] [li]Armory [][/li] [li]PVP Supplies [][/li] [li]Food Store [][/li] [/list] [b]Altars[/b] [list] [li]Prayer Altar [][/li] [li]Ancient Altar [][/li] [/list] [b]Teleport[/b] [list] [li]Carpet [][/li] [li]Dark Portal [][/li] [li]Dark magic book Portal [][/li] [li]Slayer Boss npc [][/li] [/list][/li][/list]
[hr] [list][li][size=18pt][b]Custom Training Area:[/b][/size] The main concept of this custom training is to train new players. It's also a mini-quest. Player must pay 1200Gp to get to the island by a flying carpet. On the Island, he can talk to a stranger. The stranger will tell him his story. The stranger will after ask him to bring his holy book back to him. The book was been taken by a ghost lvl 159. The main Island is devised by tree parts. Killing the boss to get to the next Part. On the final Part you can kill the Ghost[Shade] lvl 159 who will drop the holy book. After that you can return the holy book back to the Stranger. He will reward you. [b]Keys / Doors[/b] [list] [li]Part #1 [][/li] [li]Part #2 [][/li] [li]Part #3 [][/li] [/list] [list] [li]Part #1 Easy Training[list] [li]Goblins [!][/li] [li]Skeleton [!][/li] [li]Skeleton Mage [b]BOSS[/b] [/][/li] [/list][/li] [li]Part #2 Medium Training[list] [li]Ice Giant [!][/li] [li]Moss Giant [!][/li] [li]Cyclops [!][/li] [li]Fire Giant [b]BOSS[/b] [/][/li] [/list][/li] [li]Part #3 Hard Training [list] [li]Rock Golem [!][/li] [li]Ghost[Shade] [b]BOSS[/b] [/][/li] [/list][/li] [/list][/li][/list]
[hr] [list][li][size=18pt][b]Media:[/b][/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/U7xZ6.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QBBjd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/H78p5.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fQvIS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XtSJ2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Q8MKf.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KzTP5.png[/img][/li] [/list][/ul]

item.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:14, topic:462677”][quote author=artem543 link=topic=565878.msg4116161#msg4116161 date=1349056393]

And people say I do too many servers?

This is my first since almost 3 months.
[/quote]
I thought you were the client developer for Rune-Pact?[/quote]
I am still. But the project is not really active anymore.

Scarecrows:

This is crazy actually. I was developing a server privately over a year ago, it has the name Asgard. And players had the ability to build their own kingdoms! Crazy coincidence!

Haha…

I_Hybrid_I:

Did you rip that custom zone? Or did you made it yourself?

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=514816.0 I made it.

Read full topic

item.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Jaxus:

There is too much water. If you are going to design a custom, make a new city – not a port.

Thank you for your feedback. We will not build up a city. Yes, It has a lot of water. Once we get everything setup. We will expand the territory. It will become bigger and bigger. I have already few things which will be added later:

[ul][li]Houses[/li][/ul]

Latter on, Every single shop will be placed in a house. The Home will be bigger. We are planning something like Al Harid. I’m talking about the size.

[ul][li]Port[/li][/ul]

You just gave me the Idea. If the city will expand. We could build a port. Which will have boats. Also, Sailing and fishing spots will be added.

[ul][li]PvP[/li][/ul]

I was thinking about creating an area. In which you could fight versus players. Probably, It would be somehow a mini-game/funpvp.

[ul][li]Skilling[/li][/ul]

I’ll probably will redesign the map. I’ll include trees, mining rocks and other…

Read full topic

item.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

There is too much water. If you are going to design a custom, make a new city – not a port.

Read full topic

item.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
item.dc:creator: @sour sour
item.description:
@sour wrote:

The Development Team thread has been created, it can be found here. If you do happen to apply, please be as honest as possible. This team will thrive off of honesty and friendship, as corny as that sounds. If you all have any questions, please, don’t hesitate to message myself or Arty. We will answer any questions you may have regarding KOA. I would just like to thank everyone for the support thus far, so thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Looks to Allstar ish. The custom mapdata is unique but I don’t like the general concept. Goodluck.

Read full topic

item.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!
item.dc:creator: @sour sour
item.description:
@sour wrote:

[center]Hosting:[/center]

  • This will be hosted in the future, after we are both satisfied with our work, and not before. I do believe Arty was talking about home-hosting it for a bit, until we come up with the funds to purchase a VPS, or something along the lines of that. However, that’s the last thing on our minds right now. We need to focus patching major bugs/glitches to ensure satisfaction regarding the actual gameplay.

[center]Developers:[/center]

  • As of now, Arty and I are the only developers. We will create a development team thread later tonight or tomorrow afternoon, depending on if any complications come along throughout the day(s). Just note, we are looking for somewhat experienced developers who know the basics. While applying, Arty or myself will come up with a simple task and you must complete it within 24 hours of us sending it.

I do believe Arty is working on the website, or he was about 3 hours ago. After we get that set up, we will get the link validated and whatnot, post it here, and you all can sign-up and follow the development. As of now, we don’t have a certain date for pre-alpha, as time progresses we will let you all know!

Also, don’t hesitate to post suggestions down below. We are trying to implement unique content (never-before-seen), so if you think you have an original suggestion, and you haven’t seen it on any other server before, you may PM Artem543 or simply comment below. Thanks in advance!

Read full topic

item.title: Kingdom Of Asgard - Something New!

@kronixz wrote:

sexy as fuck sign me up
